node.title: Police car damaged during reckless New Year's Eve dirt bike ride through city
node.description: Police say cyclists and drivers had to take evasive action to protect themselves from the group as they raced around Auckland yesterday.
node.content:
["Two men have been arrested and five dirt bikes have been impounded following a reckless New Year's Eve ride through Auckland.", "", "
People riding dirt bikes along Fanshawe Street in central Auckland on New Year's Eve. Photo: Coopersgrl / Reddit
", "Inspector Jacqui Whittaker said many cyclists and drivers had to take evasive action to protect themselves from the group, none of whom had a valid licence to ride the bikes.", "Whittaker said many of the riders were also extremely aggressive towards police and a patrol car was damaged.", "The two arrested men face charges including failing to stop, careless driving and driving without a licence."]
